bio.description: We bring innovative ideas to life
bio.name: DePaul iD Lab

posts.description:
Panel Alert!
Get ready for our final panel, Navigating the Innovation Roadmap with Legal Requirements: A View from the Executives’ Suite.
Led by moderator Julian Dibbell and featuring powerhouse leaders Talvis Love, Joe Powell and Dale Davis, this session dives into how top executives are driving innovation while mastering the balance between strategy, governance, and compliance.
Last day to register don’t miss your chance!
Register here to attend the conference: https://lnkd.in/gfvKtyg8

How do ideas become innovation?
Join us at ODi 2025 for Bringing Innovation to Life with DePaul iD Lab, featuring panelists Thomas Zwick, Akbar Aidarov, and moderator Dwayne Prosko. Discover how innovation translates into real-world impact and drives meaningful outcomes."
Register here to attend the conference: https://lnkd.in/gfvKtyg8

Don’t miss this opportunity!
Join us for an exclusive Networking Event following ODi, where you’ll have the chance to connect with industry leaders and representatives from multiple organizations.
Expand your network, exchange ideas, and explore potential collaborations.
Register here to attend the conference: https://lnkd.in/gfvKtyg8

Panel Alert!
We’re bringing you another exciting session at ODi 2025: From Insight to Impact – Executing Digital Strategy across the Enterprise!
Featuring Denice Young-Durrant, Jennifer Wimberly, Phil Van Swol and Don Fleschut, guided by moderator Jobin Ephrem, this panel will highlight how enterprises can turn vision into measurable outcomes through effective digital execution.

Register Now: https://lnkd.in/gfvKtyg8

Panel Alert!
We’re thrilled to announce another exciting session at ODi 2025 — Legal Boundaries in a Digital World: Balancing Innovation with Legal Requirements.
Join Moderator Brad Peterson and our distinguished panelists Joe Pennell, Brandon Brooks, Dale Davis and Craig Bryson as they explore how organizations can drive innovation while staying compliant in an increasingly complex digital landscape.
Don’t miss this insightful conversation on integrating AI for strategic advantage and navigating the evolving legal framework around technology.
Register Link: https://lnkd.in/gfvKtyg8

Panel Alert!
Another dynamic session at ODi 2025 — Tactical Approach to Bringing Innovation to Life.
Join Moderator Yele Adelakun and our distinguished panelists Shuchita S., Joe Powell, Rob McGillen, and Tim Dickson as they share practical insights on transforming innovative ideas into real-world impact.
Get ready for an engaging discussion on how leaders are redefining innovation to accelerate growth and shape the future of their organizations.
Register Link: https://lnkd.in/gfvKtyg8

Panel Alert!
We’re kicking off ODi 2025 with our first panel: From Strategy to Execution – Governance and Resource Framework!
Join an incredible lineup of leaders — Brad Peterson, Talvis Love, and Paul Haisman in a discussion moderated by Lauren Rosen. Together, they’ll explore how organizations can translate strategy into action with the right governance and resource frameworks.

Register Now: https://lnkd.in/gfvKtyg8

Featuring Denice Young-Durrant, Phil Van Swol and Don Fleschut, guided by moderator Jobin Ephrem, this panel will highlight how enterprises can turn vision into measurable outcomes through effective digital execution.

We had the opportunity to visit Microsoft - Innovation Hub, where Paul Edlund, Hub Architect and Chief Technologist, shared insights on Microsoft’s cloud data & analytics platform, Power BI, and Copilot.
A big thank you to Paul for the engaging session, to Don Fleschut from Ryerson for helping make this collaboration possible, and to Samantha Josupait and Othniel Tucker for their support in coordinating the visit.

ODi 2025 General Sponsor!

Thank you, Morningstar, for your continued support. Your partnership is essential in helping us drive innovation, foster collaboration, and make ODi 2025 a success.

Registration is Now Open!

Join us at ODi 2025, the premier professional conference bringing together leaders, innovators, and change-makers from diverse industries and organizations.
Limited tickets available, secure your spot today!

Register Now : https://lnkd.in/gfvKtyg8

ODi 2025 Silver Sponsors!

We are delighted to welcome OMRON Americas as a Silver Sponsor for ODi 2025, after their valued support as a General Sponsor in 2024. We are equally pleased to have Ability Engineering Technology Inc join the ODi community this year. Your support plays a vital role in driving innovation and shaping an event that fosters collaboration, knowledge-sharing, and forward-thinking ideas. Thank you for partnering with us and contributing to the success of ODi 2025.

ODi 2025 General Sponsor!

We’re grateful for the support of Morningstar and are excited to welcome QualiWare this year.
Your partnership is vital in helping us drive innovation, foster collaboration, and make ODi 2025 a success.

<!---->Last Friday, we held our Fall Quarter Town Hall, where we revisited and refined our vision and mission, celebrated achievements, and gave each other a well-deserved pat on the back. We discussed the exciting projects currently underway, new initiatives on the horizon, and reflected on projects that are wrapping up. We’re looking forward to ODi 2025!<!---->

ODi 2025 Gold Sponsors!

We’re grateful to our Gold Sponsors: KPMG US, Walgreens, and Origin.
KPMG US and Walgreens, who generously supported ODi 2024 as Silver Sponsors, have elevated their commitment this year as Gold Sponsors. We also sincerely thank Origin for continuing its valued partnership as a returning Gold Sponsor.
Your support plays a vital role in making ODi 2025 a truly impactful experience.

ODi 2025 Platinum Sponsors!

A Big Thank You to Mayer Brown, Our Platinum Sponsor for ODi 2025!
We are especially excited to share that this year’s conference will be hosted at Mayer Brown. Thank you for your generous contribution and for providing us with this incredible opportunity to bring ODi 2025 at your venue.

A Special Thank You to Abbott, Our Platinum Sponsor for ODi 2025! Abbott has been a valued partner of the DePaul iD Lab since 2019, first supporting ODi as a Gold Sponsor and advancing to Platinum Sponsorship in 2022. Their continued commitment has played a vital role in shaping this event and fostering innovation within our community. We are truly grateful for their ongoing partnership.
Member Spotlight: Meet Vishakha Kamothi. She works at the lab as a Data Scientist. Here is what she has to say about working at the iD Lab.
<!---->We are pleased to announce our ODi focus for 2025: From Insights to Strategic Execution!<!---->

The DePaul iD Lab recently wrapped up its second AI Summer Camp for high school students!
Over the course of 3.5 weeks, rising juniors and seniors explored the world of artificial intelligence from foundational concepts to hands-on applications. Guided by the iD Lab staff, students collaborated on AI-powered solutions for Abbott, applying their knowledge to real-world challenges.
As part of the program, students also visited leading organizations to gain firsthand experience and learn about their remarkable AI products and innovations.
A huge thank you to everyone who helped make this camp a outstanding success!

As the culmination of the Abbott AI Summer Camp 2025, four student teams presented innovative GenAI projects focused on building Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems for medical devices research.

Each team explored distinct approaches from Graph RAG and advanced chunking techniques to thoughtful evaluation strategies by tackling complex challenges in healthcare AI. The architectures designed presented an impressive understanding of real-world AI applications.

Congratulations to winning team Tanmay Garg, Joe Nowak and Sanjith Yelavarthy for an outstanding showing at the AI Summer Camp showcase!

A huge shoutout to Aarathi Maheswaraguru, Rian Jain, Carlos Munoz, Angelina Huang, Nicole Niewiadomski, Jenine Jain, Sreechand Uppalapu, Tanay Doshi, Luqman Syed, Yash Kaushik, Zachary Wong and Patryk Kasprzyk for your hard work and creativity.

The session concluded with insightful feedback and engaging discussion, thanks to our amazing judges Jennifer Wimberly, Director of IT and Data Analytics at Abbott, and Yele Adelakun, Founder & Director of the DePaul iD Lab.

Last week, we had the pleasure of hosting Jobin Ephrem, as our guest speaker. He led an engaging session in a Q&A format, where our Summer Camp students asked some truly thoughtful and curious questions.
Thank you, Jobin Ephrem, for making the session so interactive and thoughtful.

Our Summer Camp students visited CCC Intelligent Solutions NXT Lab, where they had the opportunity to learn about their innovative AI products. It was an incredibly informative and engaging experience. To make the visit even more special, the students received thoughtful gifts, which they absolutely loved!
Thank you to Reza Rooholamini and Gelareh Kalantari for organizing such a meaningful and memorable visit!

Summer Camp students had a great session with Jennifer Wimberly and Wenzhao (Sylvia) Bi , who led an engaging talk on GenAI. They shared their career journeys, offered insights on choosing the right AI tools, and highlighted the irreplaceable human skills that define responsible AI. The session wrapped up with a thoughtful and interactive Q&A.
Thank you to Jennifer Wimberly and Wenzhao (Sylvia) Bi for sharing your time, experience, and energy with our students!

Students visited Morningstar, where they had the opportunity to interact with Mo,” Morningstar’s enterprise-level AI.
A big thank you to Nate Hartauer and Matthew Richmond for your incredible support and for sharing your knowledge with our students!
Had a great time at the KPMG US Chicago office for a case study workshop. Big thanks to Dwayne Prosko for leading such an insightful session.

We had an amazing opportunity to visit Microsoft with our AI summer camp students as part of an industry visit. David Giard hosted us with an engaging session on Empowering AI and demonstrated how tools like Microsoft Copilot can be used across various applications to make work easier and more efficient.

He also gave us a tour, showcasing advanced AI and AR technologies, including industrial applications. The students loved seeing real-world tech in action and learning directly from the source.

Thank you so much, David Giard, for making this visit so meaningful for all of us!

This week, we kicked off the Abbott Labs AI Summer Bootcamp for high school students at the iD Lab!
Our founder and Director of the iD Lab, Yele Adelakun, started the camp with an inspiring talk about what really matters when learning AI — not just the tools, but also teamwork, curiosity, and having fun along the way.
As students began working on the use case from Abbott and collaborating with our data scientists, they also got to hear from last year’s camp alumni, who shared how the experience sparked their interest in AI and helped build their confidence in solving real-world problems.
Huge thanks to Abhi Choudhary, Nik Umapathy, and Ndiana Obot for coming back to share about your journeys, your stories truly inspired this year’s group!

We recently had the pleasure of hosting Akhil Babu, Senior Design Researcher at IBM – India System Design Labs, for a deeply engaging workshop on Designing Business Through the Lens of Services and Systems.”

Akhil walked us through how service design can shape not just experiences, but entire business ecosystems. From understanding service touch-points and stakeholder relationships to rethinking the role of design in decision-making, the session went far beyond methods, it was about mindset.

What stood out most was his emphasis on slowing down, asking better questions, and designing for flow rather than just function. We walked away with new ways of framing value, future-facing project ideas, resources for continued learning, and most importantly, a renewed sense of purpose in how we design.

Thank you, Akhil Babu, for your generosity and depth. We can’t wait to apply what we’ve learned!

Get ready - ODi 2025 is happening on October 24th!
Save the date and stay tuned for all the exciting updates.
Management Spotlight: Meet Manivarsh Adi, Head of Data Science at iD Lab. Here’s what the team has to say about his dedication and leadership.
Management Spotlight: Meet Shruti Srivastava, Head of UX & Research at iD Lab. Here’s what the team shared about her inspiring leadership.
Management Spotlight: Meet Prashant Trivedi, Operations Manager at iD Lab. Here’s what the team has to say about his steady support and positive impact.
Management Spotlight: Meet Aishwarya Rao Nagulavancha, Client Relations Manager at the iD Lab. Here’s what the team has to say about her leadership and impact.

When projects line up and everyone is caught up in their own tasks, there’s one team that consistently goes above and beyond to keep us comfortable and supports us, they are our incredible management team - Aishwarya Rao Nagulavancha [ Client Relations Manager], Prashant Trivedi [Operations Manager], Shruti Srivastava [Head of UX & Research] and Manivarsh Adi [Head of Data Science]. Today, we proudly recognize these hardworking leaders whose dedication, passion, and behind the scenes effort make all the difference at the iD Lab. They truly deserve this appreciation and a special congratulations to each one of them on their graduation, your growth both professionally and academically, continues to inspire us all!

Congratulations to Aishwarya Rao Nagulavancha (CRM/SM, MS in Information Systems), Prashant Trivedi (Operations Manager, MS in Data Science), Manivarsh Adi (Data scientist, MS in Artificial Intelligence), Clara Dandenell (Scrum Master, MS in Information Systems), Luke Agnew (Data scientist, Under Grad in Data Science), Naveen Kumar Reddy Veeramreddy (Data scientist, MS in Data Science), Uday Kiran Galla Srinivasalu (Data scientist, MS in Data Science), Chandana Bhat Thambrahalli (Data scientist, MS in Data Science), Sashank M (Data scientist, MS in Data Science), Mrunali Patil (Data scientist, MS in Data Science) and Noor sumaiya (Scrum Master, MS in Information Systems).
Your journey at the iD Lab has been truly inspiring. We’re proud of all you’ve achieved and grateful for your impact. We wish you the very best in your next chapter!

At iD Lab, we hosted Shark Tank event where our talented lab members pitched their innovative ideas to our panel judges Eben Hewitt, Valerie Hall, and Jason Jacobsohn.
Each idea reflected the creativity, purpose, and potential in their ideas. After a round of thoughtful pitches and engaging conversations, two standout teams — Raahi and Finfluencers were selected to receive funding and support to move their ideas forward from iD Lab.
Congratulations to the winners Syed Taha Abbas Naqvi, Ramya Yerramilli, Sashank M, Emil Saliakhov, Aman Lokhande and Navika Maglani your ideas matter, and this is just the beginning.

We had an insightful session at the iD Lab with Marc Jason Grens, Co-Founder and President of DigitalMint, who shared his day-to-day work and experiences with ransomware and Digital Mint's real-world response strategies. His perspective added clarity and gave our project with Digital Mint a valuable direction.
Thank you, Marc Jason Grens, for taking the time to engage with our team and sharing your experience!

Applications are now open for our AI Summer Bootcamp in collaboration with Abbott. This free, hands-on program at DePaul iD Lab will empower high school students to dive into the world of AI.
Register now using the link- https://lnkd.in/gjYkjX36
Member Spotlight: Meet Uday Kiran Galla Srinivasalu. He works at the lab as a data scientist. Here is what he has to say about working at the iD Lab.

We had the pleasure of welcoming Don Fleschut, Chief Data Officer at Ryerson, for a visit to the iD Lab. It was a great opportunity for our members to connect, discuss data-driven innovation, and share what we're working on!
Member Spotlight: Meet Luke Agnew. He works at the lab as a data scientist. Here is what he has to say about working at the iD Lab.

At iD Lab, we had a hands-on Power BI workshop where we learned to build dashboards, create reports, and visualize data.Thank you Uday Kiran Galla Srinivasalu, for leading the session and helping us strengthen our skills!

Last week, the iD Lab had the pleasure of hosting our annual CIO Luncheon at Baker McKenzie, bringing together tech leaders and lawyers for a powerful discussion on how artificial intelligence is reshaping the legal landscape.
The conversation explored both the exciting opportunities and the unique challenges of AI, today and in the future. A big thank you to our esteemed panelists Peter George, Alex Crowley, and Brandon Brooks, and moderator Yele Adelakun, whose expertise made the session truly impactful. We also appreciate Baker McKenzie for their generous hospitality and to all our partners who helped make this event a success.
<!---->Happy Easter weekend from the iD Lab team! Wishing everyone a joyful and peaceful holiday 🐣<!---->

<!---->Last Friday, we hosted our iD Lab Town Hall, where we revisited our vision, mission, and team culture. We welcomed new members, celebrated recent milestones, and aligned on our goals. Exciting projects and events are in the pipeline, as well as projects coming to an end. We're looking forward to a fun and meaningful quarter ahead!<!---->

<!---->Yesterday we hosted a User Interface Design workshop for our UX Designers at the lab, focusing on the how to create UIs and scalable components using Figma. It was a great and educational session where some of the new designers got to explore grid system, responsive design, constraints and auto layout.<!---->
